Issue.creator: baohua
Issue.summary: User-dashboard component keeps reporting error after starting
Issue.description: bc-dashboard@1.0.0 start /usr/app/src user-dashboard | > node dist user-dashboard | user-dashboard | module.js:538 user-dashboard | throw err; user-dashboard | ^ user-dashboard | user-dashboard | Error: Cannot find module '/usr/app/src/dist' user-dashboard | at Function.Module._resolveFilename (module.js:536:15) user-dashboard | at Function.Module._load (module.js:466:25) user-dashboard | at Function.Module.runMain (module.js:676:10) user-dashboard | at startup (bootstrap_node.js:187:16) user-dashboard | at bootstrap_node.js:608:3 user-dashboard | npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE user-dashboard | npm ERR! errno 1 user-dashboard | npm ERR! bc-dashboard@1.0.0 start: `node dist` user-dashboard | npm ERR! Exit status 1 user-dashboard | npm ERR! user-dashboard | npm ERR! Failed at the bc-dashboard@1.0.0 start script. user-dashboard | npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above. user-dashboard | npm WARN Local package.json exists, but node_modules missing, did you mean to install? user-dashboard | user-dashboard | npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in: user-dashboard | npm ERR! /root/.npm/_logs/2017-12-14T06_24_50_802Z-debug.log user-dashboard exited with code 1 >
